document_data.name: ''Prisoner's Manacles''
document_data.mainbody: e manacles gave the wearer a certain brutal strength and power, especially when striking with their weighted fists directly.
document_data.Powers: The manacles gave the wearer a certain brutal strength and power, especially when striking with their weighted fists directly.
document_data.History: The ''prisoner's manacles'' were found by [[Cormyr]]ean forces that overcame [[Rantha]], the gatekeeper officer of General [[Marthir]]. This was part of a greater counterattack at the [[Netherese Recruiting Center]] inside the Wheloon Prison, where prisoners were taken in and turned into soldiers for [[Thultanthar]]'s army.
